subject: Football
Super Bowl
Olympic Games
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps, 27, who retired after last summer’s London Games with 22 Olympic medals for his career, will be at Super Bowl XLVII, cheering on his hometown Ravens.
snippet: Michael Phelps, 27, who retired after last summer’s London Games with 22 Olympic medals for his career, will be at Super Bowl XLVII, cheering on his hometown Ravens.
